title: Just Blame Me For Being Blind in the Beginning - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Clingy Lover   Cohabitation   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Models   Modern Day   Showbiz   Wealthy Characters
author: Ban Li Zi   Chestnut   板栗子
description:
Hot and glamorous ’18th tier’ actress, Pei Ying, is actually a conservative woman who hasn’t even given away her first kiss yet. 
 
Rich heir, Song Nanchuan, appears elegant and disciplined, but is the kind who just takes kisses without a word!

…Madness!>
